Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this extraordinary opportunity, I kindly propose a price of $15000. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
